product_name: Merrell Enlighten Shine Breeze Shoes - Women's
long_description: The sporty and sassy Merrell Enlighten Shine Breeze Shoes masterfully mix athletic attitude and street-smart style, and feature cool breathable mesh uppers for comfort on your around-town adventures. M Select MOVE footbeds allow natural flexibility, stability and cushioning in every step. Merrell air cushions in the heels absorb shock and add stability. Compression molded EVA footframe provides stability and comfort. Molded nylon arch shanks provide additional stability. Merrell Enlighten Shine Breeze Shoes feature M Select Fresh antimicrobial treatment to help prevent odors. M Select Grip traction outsoles stick to wet and dry surfaces.
short_description: The sporty and sassy Merrell Enlighten Shine Breeze Shoes masterfully mix athletic attitude and street-smart style, and feature cool breathable mesh uppers for comfort on your around-town adventures.
